other_tests.findings: The patient was found to be heterozygous for a TR/H9252 gene mutation (A317T). Both parents had normal thyroid function tests and had no TR/H9252 gene mutation.
Amniotic fluid demonstrated that the fetus did not carry the mutant maternal TR/H9252 gene (A317T).
Normal TSH of 2.5 mU/liter, elevated free T4 by analog method of 3.0 ng/dl, and free T3 of 1070 pg/dl.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Yearly thyroid function tests remained consistent with RTH.

other_tests.findings: Total T4 of 19.6 µg/dl, TSH of 0.9 mU/liter.
Total T4 of 23.7 µg/dl, TSH of 54 mU/liter.
